Title: Relates to providing a testimonial privilege to critical incident stress#management/crisis response/peer support team members
Summary: Provides a testimonial privilege to critical incident stress management/crisis response/peer support team members concerning communications made during critical incident stress management/crisis response services.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil practice law and rules, in relation to providing a testimonial privilege to critical incident stress management/crisis response/peer support team members concerning communications made during critical incident stress management/crisis response services
